data.title: Heaven Can Wait - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of Heaven Can Wait with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
72 Metascore

1978

2 hr 0 mins

Drama, Fantasy, Comedy

PG

Watchlist

Where to Watch

A quarterback's soul is mistakenly sent to heaven after an accident, and his body is cremated. Before long, he's given a new body on Earth and sparks a relationship with an activist who's against his persona's bad practices. Based on the play by Harry Segall. Remake of "Here Comes Mr. Jordan."
